page.title: 08Amenities(cont)&Leisure
page.content: Other amenities are the hospital and a seafront hotel.The hospital was sited in Bramber Road in 1959.This has since disappeared.The hotel,in Marine Parade,has also vanished. More recent additions are the telephone exchange in Chyngton Lane,the{Post Office}and{Police {Station}in Church Street. {Leisure:1959-1985 } The major amenity for leisure has been the{Golf course.}The Clubhouse is sited on the southernmost point of Southdown Road.The course itself is sited on Seaford Head. The Martello Tower,which has been in our area since Napoleonic times,is sited in Marine Parade.The{Promenade stretches along the beach.In our area it runs from Marine Parade to Hawks Brow.The Opera House and Little Theatre are positioned in Steyne Road.
